subject: Look what the cat hacked up.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
A 12-808 multi band radio I got for $3 at the thrift store.  With this
model you can't just clip the the mute wire, you also have to ground the end
going to the radio board. I'll add external sweep too.

 F-S
